db:abstract.db:para: The QOpenGLShader class allows OpenGL shaders to be compiled.
This class was introduced in Qt 5.0.

db:listitem.db:para: QOpenGLShader is part of Rendering in 3D

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: This class supports shaders written in the OpenGL Shading Language (GLSL) and in the OpenGL/ES Shading Language (GLSL/ES).
QOpenGLShader and QOpenGLShaderProgram shelter the programmer from the details of compiling and linking vertex and fragment shaders.

db:section.db:title: enum QOpenGLShader::ShaderTypeBit
db:section.db:para: This enum specifies the type of QOpenGLShader that is being created.

db:td.db:para: Vertex shader written in the OpenGL Shading Language (GLSL).
Fragment shader written in the OpenGL Shading Language (GLSL).
Geometry shaders written in the OpenGL Shading Language (GLSL) based on the OpenGL core feature (requires OpenGL >= 3.2).
Tessellation control shaders written in the OpenGL shading language (GLSL), based on the core feature (requires OpenGL >= 4.0).
Tessellation evaluation shaders written in the OpenGL shading language (GLSL), based on the core feature (requires OpenGL >= 4.0).
Compute shaders written in the OpenGL shading language (GLSL), based on the core feature (requires OpenGL >= 4.3).

db:section.db:para: The ShaderType type is a typedef for QFlags<ShaderTypeBit>. It stores an OR combination of ShaderTypeBit values.

db:section.db:title: [explicit] QOpenGLShader::QOpenGLShader(QOpenGLShader::ShaderType type, QObject *parent = 0)
db:section.db:para: Constructs a new QOpenGLShader object of the specified type and attaches it to parent. If shader programs are not supported, QOpenGLShaderProgram::hasOpenGLShaderPrograms() will return false.
This constructor is normally followed by a call to compileSourceCode() or compileSourceFile().
The shader will be associated with the current QOpenGLContext.

db:section.db:title: [virtual noexcept] QOpenGLShader::~QOpenGLShader()
db:section.db:para: Deletes this shader. If the shader has been attached to a QOpenGLShaderProgram object, then the actual shader will stay around until the QOpenGLShaderProgram is destroyed.

db:section.db:title: bool QOpenGLShader::compileSourceCode(const char *source)
db:section.db:para: Sets the source code for this shader and compiles it. Returns true if the source was successfully compiled, false otherwise.

db:section.db:title: bool QOpenGLShader::compileSourceCode(const QByteArray &source)
db:section.db:para: This is an overloaded function.
Sets the source code for this shader and compiles it. Returns true if the source was successfully compiled, false otherwise.

db:section.db:title: bool QOpenGLShader::compileSourceCode(const QString &source)
db:section.db:para: This is an overloaded function.
Sets the source code for this shader and compiles it. Returns true if the source was successfully compiled, false otherwise.

db:section.db:title: bool QOpenGLShader::compileSourceFile(const QString &fileName)
db:section.db:para: Sets the source code for this shader to the contents of fileName and compiles it. Returns true if the file could be opened and the source compiled, false otherwise.

db:section.db:title: [static] bool QOpenGLShader::hasOpenGLShaders(QOpenGLShader::ShaderType type, QOpenGLContext *context = 0)
db:section.db:para: Returns true if shader programs of type type are supported on this system; false otherwise.
The context is used to resolve the GLSL extensions. If context is null, then QOpenGLContext::currentContext() is used.

db:section.db:title: bool QOpenGLShader::isCompiled() const
db:section.db:para: Returns true if this shader has been compiled; false otherwise.

db:section.db:title: QString QOpenGLShader::log() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the errors and warnings that occurred during the last compile.

db:section.db:title: GLuint QOpenGLShader::shaderId() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the OpenGL identifier associated with this shader.

db:section.db:title: QOpenGLShader::ShaderType QOpenGLShader::shaderType() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the type of this shader.

db:section.db:title: QByteArray QOpenGLShader::sourceCode() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the source code for this shader.
